actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to extend and amend programs under the Head Start Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Head Start Amendments of 1990 - Amends the Head Start Act to extend through FY 1993 the authorization of appropriations for the Head Start program. Revises conditions on renewed funding of Head Start grantees and priorities in designation of Head Start agencies. Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to review thoroughly each designated Head Start agency at least every three years. Requires the head of each Head Start agency to coordinate its Head Start programs with public schools, the State agency that administers Aid to Families with Dependent Children under the Social Security Act, and other programs serving the children and families served by that Head Start agency. Amends the Child Development Associate Scholarship Assistance Act of 1985 to authorize appropriations for FY 1991 through 1993 for the child development associate scholarship assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to extend and amend programs under the Head Start Act, and for other purposes.
